titles.title: Bond Financing Renewal Act of 2005
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the qualified small issue bond provisions.
Bond Financing Renewal Act of 2005

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Bond Financing Renewal Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) accelerate to FY2007 (from FY2010) the $10 million issuance increase for qualified small-issue bonds; and (2) allow a tax deduction for interest expense on qualified small-issue bonds with an aggregate authorized face amount of less than $2 million.
